# Standard model characteristics
# Scale is applied to the model to correct
# it to observed value.
#
# object   %error  scale
# 
#   asteroids/moons/planets
CALLISTO   20      1.0
CERES      20      1.0
GANYMEDE   20      1.0
NEPTUNE    20      1.0
PALLAS     20      1.0
URANUS     20      1.0
VESTA      20      1.0
